fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Redirect all visits to a player to yourself, and gain one Strike to use.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  At the beginning of every night, all Striked players alive grants you 1 Volt Point. A Striked player dying causes you to lose 1 Volt Point. As you gain Volt Points, you become more powerful.
2 VP: Basic attack only on Full Moon
3 VP: Basic attack whenever
4 VP: Roleblock and control immunity
5 VP: Rampage attack
6 VP: Lynchproof once per game
7 VP: Can make two actions per night
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain basic defense.
